function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharp edges of graphene nano-walls inactivating bacteria and viruses, leading to potential reduction in survival rates.","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to viral and bacterial infections in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementation of technology to mitigate the impact of sharp edges on bacteria and viruses.","Technologies":"Nano-coating, surface modifications, and functionalization technologies.","People":"Building occupants, employees, and visitors in the built environment.","Owner":"Building owners, construction companies, and facility management."},{"Description":"Surface modifications of graphene influencing antimicrobial activities and antiviral properties.","Impact":"Enhanced antiviral surfaces and coatings, reducing the impact of microbial contamination in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing surface modification techniques to enhance antimicrobial properties of graphene.","Technologies":"Covalent and noncovalent modification, functionalized graphene materials.","People":"Building occupants, employees, and visitors in the built environment.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners."},{"Description":"Agglomeration causing weakened dispersibility and adsorption capacity of graphene, reducing efficacy against microorganisms.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of graphene materials against microbial contamination in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Implementation of dispersion techniques to prevent agglomeration and maintain the effectiveness of graphene materials.","Technologies":"Dispersion technologies, agglomeration prevention techniques.","People":"Building occupants, employees, and visitors in the built environment.","Owner":"Facility management, building owners."}]}
